content: It would be good for MnM to render an opinion on the proposed guidance discussed here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Communication.2C.20Messages.2C.20Task.2C.20etc.2E
we have a call scheduled for tomorrow, normal time... I'm planning on being on the call

ok. proposed subjects:

  • approve being explicit about the abstract types UML diagram in both the narrative and the formal definitions in R5

  • discussing the methodology issues around the CDA question about .id and .extension
